channel.title: Wtf, male to female?

item.title: Wtf, male to female?
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

put this where yours is

/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/

	pHead=7;
	pTorso=25;
	pArms=29;
	pHands=35;
	pLegs=39;
	pFeet=44;
	pBeard=14;

	/*pHead=3;
	pTorso=25;
	pArms=26;
	pHands=34;
	pLegs=36;
	pFeet=42;
	pBeard=0;*/

item.title: Wtf, male to female?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“X F U R Y X, post:1, topic:154618”]Okay, Like I’ve said before, my player.java got messed up. Now I’m redoing it… and when I edit the players default look thing, his like male with his stuff on when you login, but when you take it off, you become a female… wtf… lol

Here’s my code:

[code]
//Setting player standard look
playerLook[0] = 2;
playerLook[1] = 12;
playerLook[2] = 19;
playerLook[3] = 27;
playerLook[4] = 34;
playerLook[5] = 37;

	/*playerLook[0] = 2;
	playerLook[1] = 16;
	playerLook[2] = 20;
	playerLook[3] = 31;
	playerLook[4] = 34;
	playerLook[5] = 41;*/

	//Giving the player an unique look
	playerEquipment[playerHat]=3753;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=3140;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=2890;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4087;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=6151;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=3107;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/[/code][/quote]

Most of that is quoted out anyways…

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf, male to female?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Okay, Like I’ve said before, my player.java got messed up. Now I’m redoing it… and when I edit the players default look thing, his like male with his stuff on when you login, but when you take it off, you become a female… wtf… lol

Here’s my code:

[code]
//Setting player standard look
playerLook[0] = 2;
playerLook[1] = 12;
playerLook[2] = 19;
playerLook[3] = 27;
playerLook[4] = 34;
playerLook[5] = 37;

	/*playerLook[0] = 2;
	playerLook[1] = 16;
	playerLook[2] = 20;
	playerLook[3] = 31;
	playerLook[4] = 34;
	playerLook[5] = 41;*/

	//Giving the player an unique look
	playerEquipment[playerHat]=3753;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=3140;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=2890;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4087;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=6151;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=3107;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/[/code]

Read full topic
